items.name: Fridge Filler Mixed
items.desc:
A Mixed 6 pack containing:
x3 Headband Pale Ale 5.5% ABV
x3 Lightbulb Extra Pale Ale 4.5% ABV
All 440ml Cans
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: Fruit Car Sight Exhibition DIPA
items.desc:
6 Cans of Fruit Car Sight Exhibition DIPA.
Citra here... Citra there… Citra everywhere! You get the picture… One of our most cherished beers and for good reason! Get set for soft and luscious wallops of mango and apricot alongside a melange of citric based fruits, and a little sweaty goodness to close things out and keep things 'real'.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: I Will Need Your Signature Pale Ale
items.desc:
The biggest dry hop we’ve lavished upon a pale ale EVER! Signature’s back and it’s fruitier, pinier & sweatier than ever before thanks to a quite frankly ridiculous amount of hops! 5.5% Mosaic adoration!
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: Neal Gets Things Done IPA
items.desc:
6 cans of Neal Gets Things Done IPA.
Off the canning line, into the fridges, and drinking like a dream, Neal’s back getting things done. Sit back, relax and enjoy this flavour-packed ride of Simcoe, Citra, Mosaic & Nelson Sauvin - a magic trip awaits.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: Unknown Worlds Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 Cans of Unknown Worlds Pale Ale.
We’ve taken one of our base pale ale recipes and excessively hopped it on the cold side with Amarillo, BRU-1 & Comet for a crushable 5.2% offering loaded with orange, pineapple & zesty grapefruit flavours!
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: Watt Moon IPA
items.desc:
6 cans of 20 Watt Moon IPA.
A Strata-packed IPA backed up with a hefty dose of Citra! Dank pine needles on the nose, alongside clean grapefruit and tropical fruit flavours.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.
